name: The Shepherd
description:
After finding an old picture of your grandfather on a camel, you decide to leave the city and set off into the serenity of the desert. In order to become a great rider, just like he was. Train your herd, befriend desert-folk, fight predators, and navigate the mysteries of the desert.

Key Features
  • Protect your sheep from predators in turn-based battles. With many unique predators each with their own special attacks and abilities.

  • Feed your sheep as they roam around the grassland eating grass patches they encounter or if they’re lucky stumbling upon special flowers which increase their stats. Once the sheep have been fed, you can shave off their wool to sell in the market.

  • Buy and upgrade your weapons to help you defeat stronger predators.

  • Strengthen your sheep by increasing their stats of beauty, fertility and agility them better fit to fight/breed.

  • Breed your sheep to make various genetic combinations each with their own appearance and attributes

  • Meet variety of desert-folk and help them with their problems. Help them and they will help you back with gifts, helpful advice, and sometimes not so helpful advice.

  • Find the 6 mystic wells by seeking out the maps that will lead to them. When your sheep drink from these wells you will be able to select special upgrades for them unique to each bread.
